select
c.id as id, c.name as name, c.mobile as mobile, c.email as email, c.weixin as weixin, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime
from t_alert_contact as c, t_alert_group_contact as gc
where gc.group_id = #{alertGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.id = gc.contact_id
order by c.id asc
